sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; function Hero() { const [activeDetail, setActiveDetail] = useState(null); const openDetail = (id) => setActiveDetail(id); const closeDetail = () => setActiveDetail(null); return (
{/* Inline CSS */} {/* Header */}
Places Features Contact
{/* Hero Banner */}

Travel Safe, Explore Freely

{/* Places */}

Popular Tourist Places

{/* Taj Mahal */}
openDetail("taj")} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }} >
Taj Mahal

⭐ 4.8 | “A symbol of love, must-visit once in a lifetime.”

{/* Jaipur */}
openDetail("jaipur")} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }} >
Jaipur City Palace

⭐ 4.6 | “Royal vibes and amazing architecture.”

{/* Goa */}
openDetail("goa")} style={{ cursor: "pointer" }} >
Goa Beaches

⭐ 4.7 | “Perfect for sunsets, parties, and relaxation.”

{/* Detail Modals */} {activeDetail === "taj" && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Taj Mahal

Location: Agra, India

Weather: Hot summers (35–45°C), cold winters (5–10°C)

Best Season: October – March

Recent Disasters:

  • 2020 – Flooding in nearby Yamuna river
  • 2019 – Severe air pollution caused smog alerts
  • 2018 – Dust storm damaged some parts of outer walls

Ratings:

  • ⭐ 5 – “Absolutely breathtaking.”
  • ⭐ 4 – “Too crowded, but worth it.”
  • ⭐ 5 – “Best sunrise view I’ve ever seen.”
)} {activeDetail === "jaipur" && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Jaipur City Palace

Location: Jaipur, Rajasthan, India

Weather: Hot summers (40°C+), mild winters (10–15°C)

Best Season: November – February

Recent Disasters:

  • 2022 – Heavy rainfall caused waterlogging in Jaipur
  • 2019 – Hailstorm damaged some palace gardens

Ratings:

  • ⭐ 5 – “Feels like royalty.”
  • ⭐ 4 – “Guided tours are a must.”
  • ⭐ 3 – “Very crowded in peak season.”
)} {activeDetail === "goa" && (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Goa Beaches

Location: Goa, India

Weather: Tropical climate, monsoon rains (June–Sept), avg 25–32°C

Best Season: November – February

Recent Disasters:

  • 2021 – Cyclone Tauktae caused flooding
  • 2019 – Strong tides led to temporary beach closures
  • 2018 – Oil spill affected marine life briefly

Ratings:

  • ⭐ 5 – “Best sunsets in India.”
  • ⭐ 4 – “Beach parties are amazing.”
  • ⭐ 5 – “Loved the seafood shacks.”
)} {/* Footer */}

© 2025 Smart Tourist Safety Monitoring

Privacy | Terms

); } export default Hero;
